mapper.select: SELECT ct.name AS course_type_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ccs.user_id AS user_id,c.course_type_id AS course_type_id FROM course_classes_sign ccs JOIN course_classes cc ON ccs.classes_id = cc.id JOIN course c ON cc.course_id = c.id WHERE c.institution_id = #{0} AND c.course_type_id = #{1} GROUP BY ccs.user_id) un2) AS user_count FROM course_type ct WHERE ct.id = #{1}

SELECT '其他' AS course_type_name, (SELECT COUNT(u.id) FROM institution_user iu JOIN user u ON iu.user_id = u.id WHERE u.type = 3 AND iu.institution_id = #{0} AND iu.user_id NOT IN (SELECT ccs.user_id FROM course_classes_sign ccs JOIN course_classes cc ON ccs.classes_id = cc.id WHERE cc.institution_id = #{0})) AS user_count

SELECT i.name AS institution_name, (SELECT COUNT(u.id) FROM institution_user iu JOIN user u ON iu.user_id = u.id WHERE u.type = 3 AND iu.institution_id = i.id) AS user_count FROM institution i WHERE i.parent_id = #{0} OR i.id = #{0}
